SmartFieldSpec.Name: Total Active Church Member Sponsorships Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Count of member sponsorships for a given church.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Mark Sellers
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_TOTAL_ACTIVE_CHURCH_MEMBER_SPONSORSHIPS ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date select distinct (church.ID) as CONSTITUENTID ,count(member.ID) as [Total Member Sponsorships] from CONSTITUENT church inner join dbo.RELATIONSHIP r on r.RECIPROCALCONSTITUENTID = church.ID and r.ENDDATE is null inner join dbo.RELATIONSHIPTYPECODE rc on r.RELATIONSHIPTYPECODEID = rc.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT member on member.ID = r.RELATIONSHIPCONSTITUENTID inner join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.CONSTITUENTID = member.ID inner join dbo.REVENUESPLIT revsplit on revsplit.REVENUEID = ft.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = revsplit.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = slocation.ID
where --church.ID = '258E16E4-A67F-490D-8921-A34C06F90DC8' --@CONTEXTID church.ISORGANIZATION = 1 and rc.DESCRIPTION = 'Church Member' and s.STATUSCODE = 1 group by church.ID
